channel.title: Looking for 2 people,hoster and webhost provider(.com.net etc)
channel.description:
Ok i am looking for 2 people [left]hoster web host provider [/left]
im looking to start an uber server thats soooo popular and awesome we would be legends i wana start this because i love coding and helping people i know that people will love this server and will join it so please apply
[code] applying for: *how long can u host*(hosters) what kind of webhost can u provide?(webhost providers) [/code][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 10:19:53 PM[/size][hr]no one?

item.title: Looking for 2 people,hoster and webhost provider(.com.net etc)
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

[quote=“isaac2k4, post:2, topic:136440”]LOL no offence but no one will host .com for free!

go to www.namepros.com

  1. sign up
  2. go to np incentinves
  3. look at threads offering np’s ( forum money )
  4. When you get 450 nps buy a domain and webspace.

with that you can put it on mysql[/quote]I agree I just bought a domain last night and there not that expensive just pay using PayPal or something. Another problem is even if someone did buy a domain on your behalf they would legally be the owner of domain and technically they can change the nameserver etc and they could use it to blackmail you.

I guess you kind of need to know about the Internet and how domain works to understand what I am talking about but trust me if it’s going to be anyone who buys the domain it should be you 8ball.

Read full topic

go to www.namepros.com

  2. go to np incentinves
  3. look at threads offering np’s ( forum money )
  4. When you get 450 nps buy a domain and webspace.

with that you can put it on mysql
